meanings.definition: A type of caterpillar that is destructive to crops.
meanings.sent1: The palmerworms ate all the leaves on the tomato plants.
meanings.sent2: Farmers had to protect their fields from the palmerworms.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous palmerworms played hide and seek in the cornfield.
meanings.sent4: The palmerworms swarmed the fields like a hungry army.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the palmerworms devouring the crops was heartbreaking.

meanings.definition: Plural form of palmerworm, referring to multiple destructive caterpillars.
meanings.sent1: After the storm, the farmer found palmerworms everywhere in the fields.
meanings.sent2: The palmerworms caused chaos in the orchard by eating all the fruit.
meanings.sent3: The palmerworms held a tiny parade through the garden, much to the amusement of the children.
meanings.sent4: The palmerworms descended upon the fields like a dark cloud of destruction.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the palmerworms infestation haunted the farmers for years to come.
